com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers

Class SCUIAuthorizationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers.SCUIAuthorizationHelper

  • public class SCUIAuthorizationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    SCUIAuthorizationHelper is the class that checks for permission for the user given in the SCUIContext through the SCUIAuthorizationProvider. The helper maintains SCUIAuthenticationProvider per application and when the session is invalidated the SCUIAuthenticationProvider is removed. ISCUIAuthorizationProvider rasrinivasan

      • getAuthorizationProvider

        public static ISCUIAuthorizationProvider getAuthorizationProvider(SCUIContext uiContext)
        Getter of the static ISCUIAuthorizationProvider for a given SCUIContext; returns null if not yet set. uiContext of the type SCUIContext. It has the user security related information. of type ISCUIAuthorizationProvider

      • getAuthorizationProvider

        public static ISCUIAuthorizationProvider getAuthorizationProvider(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)

      • getPermission

        public static ISCUIResourcePermission getPermission(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                                    java.lang.String resourceId)
        getPermission method calls the SCUIAuthorizationProvider's getPermission method. Returns implementation of ISCUIResourcePermission given by SCUIAuthorizationProvider. uiContext of the type SCUIContext. It has the user security related information. resourceId is the unique id of the resource for which authorization is checked. of type ISCUIResourcePermission

      • hasPermission

        public static boolean hasPermission(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                    java.lang.String resourceId)
        hasPermission method calls the SCUIAuthorizationProvider's hasPermission method. Returns true if no authorization provider is registered. uiContext of the type SCUIContext. It has the user security related information. resourceId is the unique id of the resource for which authorization is checked. of type boolean

      • loadAuthorizationProvider

        public static ISCUIAuthorizationProvider loadAuthorizationProvider(SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method loads authorization provider for current application using web.xml context parameter. It allows ISCUIAuthorizationProvider to be set only once for an application. If a provider is already set, this method throws SCUIException uiContext of the type SCUIContext. It has the user security related information. of type ISCUIAuthorizationProvider

      • loadAuthorizationProvider

        public static ISCUIAuthorizationProvider loadAuthorizationProvider(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        This method loads authorization provider for current application using web.xml context paramter. It allows ISCUIAuthorizationProvider to be set only once for an application. If a provider is already set, this method throws SCUIException. This method should be used by application if they want to set authorization provider using init servlet where SCUIContext is not available. servletContext of the type javax.servlet.ServletContext of type ISCUIAuthorizationProvider

      • setAuthorizationProvider

        public static void setAuthorizationProvider(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                            ISCUIAuthorizationProvider authProvider)
        Setter for the static ISCUIAuthorizationProvider attribute. It allows ISCUIAuthorizationProvider to be set only once for an application. If a provider is already set, this method throws SCUIException uiContext of the type SCUIContext. It has the user security related information. authProvider of the type ISCUIAuthorizationProvider

      • setAuthorizationProvider

        public static void setAuthorizationProvider(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext,
                                            ISCUIAuthorizationProvider authProvider)
        Setter for the static ISCUIAuthorizationProvider attribute. It allows ISCUIAuthorizationProvider to be set only once for an application. If a provider is already set, this method throws SCUIException. This method should be used by application if they want to set authorization provider using init servlet where SCUIContext is not available. servletContext of the type javax.servlet.ServletContext authProvider of the type ISCUIAuthorizationProvider
